sentences.sentence: The city was entombed in volcanic lava.
sentences.translation: 那个城市被火山熔岩掩埋了。

sentences.sentence: Neither of them had any idea how long the body had been entombed.
sentences.translation: 他们两个人都不知道这具尸体被埋了多久了。

sentences.sentence: Many miners were entombed in the cave when there was an accident at the mine.
sentences.translation: 矿井发生事故时许多矿工葬身于坑内。
